articles.content: Felix Auger-Aliassime's on-court struggles persisted during his campaign at the 2023 Citi Open as he suffered a shock defeat to Yosuke Watanuki in the second round. His exit from the tournament has l… [+2748 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: India flaunt bench strength with ODI series victory in West Indies - DAWN.com
articles.description: Ishan Kishan (77) smashed his third successive fifty of the series and Shubman Gill struck 85 as they forged a 143-run opening stand.
articles.content: TAROUBA: A second-string India thrashed West Indies by 200 runs in the third One-day International on Tuesday to seal a 2-1 series victory in a timely boost ahead of their Asia Cup campaign next mont… [+3286 chars]
